glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.default: Search for a list of glossary terms to be displayed in alphabetical order. The terms can be selected to reveal a definition.

labelLink.title: Link aria label
labelLink.description: Aria label for each link in the index header

labelNavigation.title: Glossary navigation aria label
labelNavigation.description: Aria label for the glossary index navigation area

_isEnabled.title: Enable Glossary
_isEnabled.description: If set to 'true', the glossary extension will be enabled

_drawerOrder.title: Drawer order
_drawerOrder.description: The order in which this extension should appear as a drawer item

title.title: Glossary title
title.description: The title text which will appear in the Drawer menu screen. Also used to label the Glossary dialog element for screen readers should the display title not be used.

description.title: Glossary description
description.description: Some text to describe the Glossary
description.default: Some text to describe the Glossary that will appear in the Drawer menu screen.

displayTitle.title: Display title
displayTitle.description: The display title text which will appear in the Glossary header section within the Drawer. Used to label the Glossary dialog element for screen readers.

body.title: Body text
body.description: The body text which will appear alongside the display title in the Glossary header section within the Drawer.

clearSearch.title: Clear search text
clearSearch.description: Aria label for the clear search button

searchItemsAlert.title: Search result alert
searchItemsAlert.description: Aria label for search result alert

searchPlaceholder.title: Search placeholder text
searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search box

searchWithInDescriptionLabel.title: Search within description text
searchWithInDescriptionLabel.description: Label text for the option to search within the description

itemNotFoundMessage.title: No results message
itemNotFoundMessage.description: Text which will be displayed when the search produces no results

_isSearchEnabled.title: Enable Search
_isSearchEnabled.description: If set to 'true', the glossary extension will be enabled

_isIndexEnabled.title: Enable Index
_isIndexEnabled.description: If set to 'true', the Index linked to group headings will be enabled.

_isGroupHeadersEnabled.title: Enable Group Headers
_isGroupHeadersEnabled.description: If set to 'true', the headers will group the terms. Whenever the Index is enabled, headers will be enabled regardless of this value.

description.title: Description
description.description: Some text to explain or define the term

termAriaLabel.title: Term ARIA label
termAriaLabel.description: Optional, alternative label override for glossary item/term text
